description.message: Send en hvilken som helst nettadresse til datamaskiner innenfor hørevidde.

browser_action_title.description: Browser action title that shows up on hover.

notification_receive_title_format.description: Notification title when you receive a Tone.

notification_receive_message_format.description: Notification message when you receive a Tone.

notification_receive_test_page_message.description: Notification message sent from Tone test page.

notification_send_fail_audio_title.message: Google Tone kunne ikke høre seg selv
notification_send_fail_audio_title.description: Notification title shown when audio verification fails.

notification_send_fail_audio_message.message:
Sjekk volumet og prøv igjen.
Klikk for mer informasjon.
notification_send_fail_audio_message.description: Notification title shown when audio verification fails.

notification_send_fail_network_title.description: Notification title shown when a Tone was attempted but the network was offline.

notification_send_fail_network_message.message:
Det ser ut til at du ikke er koblet til Internett.
Klikk for mer informasjon.
notification_send_fail_network_message.description: Notification message shown when a Tone was attempted but the network was offline.

context_menu_disable.description: Label of the context menu item that disables Tone.

context_menu_enable.description: Label of the context menu item that enables Tone.

before_trying_again.description: Error resolution tip in error pages.

ensure_online.message: Sjekk at datamaskinen er koblet til Internett.

try_now.description: Call to action to try the extension.

press_button.message: Trykk på {{action_image}} for å sende en nettadresse til datamaskiner innenfor hørevidde.
press_button.description: Press the button to try it.

invite_others.message: Inviter andre brukere til å bruke Google Tone: {{shortlink}}
invite_others.description: Press the button to try it.

settings_on.description: Indicator showing that Tone is enabled.

settings_off.description: Indicator showing that Tone is disabled.

settings_on_title.description: Title showing that Tone is enabled.

settings_off_title.description: Title showing that Tone is disabled.

settings_on_subtitle.message: Du kan sende og motta nettadresser.
settings_on_subtitle.description: Subtitle showing that Tone is enabled.

settings_off_subtitle.message: Du kan ikke sende eller motta nettadresser.
settings_off_subtitle.description: Subtitle showing that Tone is disabled.

success_call.message: Gå til en annen side, og klikk på {{action_image}} for å sende den.
